channel.title: Takumar on Grainy Photos
channel.description: Recent content in Takumar on Grainy Photos

item.title: Super-Multi-Coated Macro Takumar 50mm f4
item.description: The Super-Takumar Super-Multi-Coated Macro Takumar 50mm f4 lens is a metal body macro lens capable of 1:2 macro reproduction.

item.title: Super-Takumar 35mm f2 (Model II)
item.description: The Super-Takumar 35mm f/2 lens has great optical performance, build quality and character. My go-to lens for the Pentax Spotmatic camera.

item.title: Super-Takumar 135mm f3.5
item.description: Many consider the 135mm f3.5 Takumar lens made by the Asahi Optical Company to be one of the best vintage telephoto lenses available.

item.title: Super-Takumar 28mm f3.5
item.description: The Asahi Optical Co made the Super-Takumar 28mm f3.5 wide lens between 1962 and 1975 for Pentax M42 screw mount cameras.
